H0.text: who sang the original scooby doo theme song. Austin Roberts

H1.text: who sang the original scooby doo theme song. Danny Janssen

H2.text: who sang the original scooby doo theme song. Ted Nichols

H3.text: who sang the original scooby doo theme song. Larry Marks

A4.text: The series theme song was written by David Mook and Ben Raleigh, and performed by Larry Marks.

A5.text: Seven of the second-season episodes featured chase sequences set to bubblegum pop songs recorded by Austin Roberts, who also re-recorded the theme song for this season.
